src_original: tasya ca prathamavijñānasya aupapattyaṃśikasya samanantaraniruddhasyānnantarasabhāgā cittasaṃtatiḥ pravartate /  yatra vipākasya pratisaṃvedanā prajñāyate /  tatra yaś caramavijñānasya nirodhas tatra cyutir iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /  yaḥ prathamavijñānasya prādurbhāvas tatropapattiḥ /
tgt_original: 初識生已各受其報，同分心品相續隨轉，最後識滅名為死蘊，最初識起名為生蘊。

src_original: iti hi mahārāja na kaścid dharmo 'smāl lokāt paraṃ lokaṃ gacchati /
tgt_original: 大王！ 無有少法從於此世得至他世。 所以者何？

src_original: tatra mahārāja caramavijñānam utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati //  nirudhyamānaṃ na kvacid gacchati /
tgt_original: 大王！ 身識生時，無所從來，滅無所去；

src_original: karmāpy utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati /  nirudhyamānaṃ na kvacid gacchati /
tgt_original: 彼業生時，無所從來，滅無所去；

src_original: prathamavijñānam apy utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati /  nirudhyamānaṃ ca na kvacid gacchati /
tgt_original: 初識生時，無所從來，滅無所去。

src_original: tat kasya hetoḥ /
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: svabhāvavirahitatvāt /
tgt_original: 自性離故。
